batch.name: Batch
batch.description: Returns a list of lists with the given number of items.

capitalize.name: Capitalize
capitalize.description: Capitalizes a the first letter of the given string.

column.name: Column
column.description: Returns the values from a single column in the given array.

convert_encoding.name: Convert_encoding
convert_encoding.description: Converts a string from one encoding to another.

country_name.name: Country_name
country_name.description: Returns the country name given its ISO-3166 two-letter code.

currency_name.name: Currency_name
currency_name.description: Returns the currency name given its three-letter code.

currency_symbol.name: Currency_symbol
currency_symbol.description: Returns the currency symbol given its three-letter code.

data_uri.name: Data_uri
data_uri.description: Generates a URL using the data scheme as defined in RFC 2397.

date.name: Date
date.description: Formats a date to a given format.

date_modify.name: Date_modify
date_modify.description: Modifies a date with a given modifier string.

default.name: Default
default.description: Returns the passed default value if the value is undefined or empty, otherwise the value of the variable.

escape.name: Escape
escape.description: Escapes a string using strategies that depend on the context.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Filters elements of a sequence using an arrow function.

first.name: First
first.description: .Returns the first element of a sequence.

format.name: Format
format.description: Formats a given string by replacing the placeholders. Equivalent to 'sprintf' in PHP.

format_currency.name: Format_currency
format_currency.description: Formats a number as a currency.

html_to_markdown.name: Html_to_markdown
html_to_markdown.description: Converts a block of HTML to Markdown.

inline_css.name: Inline_css
inline_css.description: Filters inline CSS styles in HTML documents.

join.name: Join
join.description: Returns a string which is the concatenation of the items of the given sequence. A second parameter can also be provided that will be the separator used between the last two items of the sequence.

json_encode.name: Json_encode
json_encode.description: Returns the JSON representation of a value.

keys.name: Keys
keys.description: Returns the keys of an array.

language_name.name: Language_name
language_name.description: Returns the language name given its two-letter code.

last.name: Last
last.description: Returns the last element of a sequence or a string.

length.name: Length
length.description: Returns the number of items of a sequence or the length of a string.

locale_name.name: Locale_name
locale_name.description: Returns the locale name given its two-letter code.

map.name: Map
map.description: Applies an arrow function to the elements of a sequence.

markdown_to_html.name: Markdown_to_html
markdown_to_html.description: Converts a block of Markdown to HTML.

merge.name: Merge
merge.description: Merges an array with another array.

nl2br.name: Nl2br
nl2br.description: Inserts HTML line breaks before all newlines in a string.

raw.name: Raw
raw.description: Marks the value as being 'safe', which means that this variable will not be auto-escaped.

reduce.name: Reduce
reduce.description: Iteratively reduces a sequence to a single value using an arrow function.

replace.name: Replace
replace.description: Formats a given string by replacing the placeholders.

reverse.name: Reverse
reverse.description: Reverses a sequence or a string.

round.name: Round
round.description: Rounds a number to a given precision.

slice.name: Slice
slice.description: Extracts a slice of a sequence or a string.

slug.name: Slug
slug.description: Transforms a given string into another string that only includes safe ASCII characters.

spaceless.name: Spaceless
spaceless.description: Remove whitespace between HTML tags (not whitespace within HTML tags or whitespace in plain text).

split.name: Split
split.description: Splits a string by the given delimiter and returns a list of strings.

striptags.name: Striptags
striptags.description: Strips SGML/XML tags and replace adjacent whitespace by one space.

timezone_name.name: Timezone_name
timezone_name.description: Returns the timezone name given a timezone identifier.

title.name: Title
title.description: Returns a titlecased version of the value. names will start with uppercase letters, all remaining characters are lowercase.

trim.name: Trim
trim.description: Strips whitespace or other characters from the beginning and end of a string.

u.name: U
u.description: Wraps a text in a Unicode object (a Symfony UnicodeString instance) that exposes methods to 'manipulate' the string.

url_encode.name: Url_encode
url_encode.description: Encodes a given string as URL segment or an array as query string.
